p:
Neonatologist must wear protective equipment (including hats, goggles, protective suits, gloves, N95 masks, etc) to resuscitate neonates delivered by confirmed and/or suspected COVID‐19 puerperant. If the puerperant is positive for SARS‐CoV‐2, the neonate must be isolated, then detected SARS‐CoV‐2.
26
